ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Tracing Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Tracing') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , ISCHANGED(Status), RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, OR( ISBLANK(ContactId), ISBLANK( NS_ExternalCaseNotes__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Contact Name and Case Resolution (External) prior to closing the Case.
